page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN WELSHPOOL
page.content: Most{industry in Welshpool}is centered on the{Severn Farm Industrial Estate on the eastern edge of the town near the River Severn. Floform Limited are the largest firm here employing 400 people in producing parts for the electronic and motor industries. Second in size is Carpenter and Patterson employing 150 people making pipe supports for power stations. Both firms were established here largely due to government grants and incentives. The remaining 6 firms are much smaller employing in all about 200 people. Other employment in Welshpool centres largely on{service industries.}On average 400 jobs are found every year mostly in nursing,clerical,shop and warehouse work. During the last month (June) 37 jobs have been taken up plus 13 on community programme schemes.
